name: Underdogs Halloween Story
description:
Two weeks ago, Seht Fawks, a local writer, went missing. His roommate found a letter in his room from the owner of the mysterious F.A. Manor. The gang get together and explore the property, looking for their friend while piecing together the mystery at F.A. Manor.

Explore different rooms and uncover secrets about it's inhabitants. As you, the community, progress, receive updates when new parts of the story are unlocked. Journey together and uncover the story. Why did Seht go to the manor? What is Clove doing? Why is everything so strange around there?
